header_title_one_key: Qarat is an ERP system that supports the Arabic language for managing gold and jewelry stores. It supports the application of the first phase of issuing the electronic invoice, in its two forms, the tax invoice and the simplified tax invoice.  And you can follow up on the general sales of products and gold jewelry by piece and weight in addition to following up the sales of each seller separately, following up your stock of products, displaying stock value reports and inventory reports, and issuing profit and loss reports to know how well your business is performing each period of time.
features_title_one_key: Fully Manage, Your Gold and Jewellery Stores' Financial Accounting
features_details_one_one_key: Assign employees and vendors and keep track of their activity records
features_details_one_two_key: Advanced reports informing you of the extent of performance of each employee and vendor according to the powers assigned to him
features_details_one_three_key: Reports showing sales achieved by each seller separately
